name: eval_dnn_coverage_tf1.13
description: Calculate the neuron coverage for the input dataset given by the user, and display it in the form of a heat map. After that, a gradient for the input dataset is computed by backpropagation. Based on the gradient, the most efficient manipulation to input values in order for the neuron coverage to increase is selected. A number of data is removed from the dataset, and these removed data are converted to new data by the selected manipulation. Then, the new data is added to the dataset, and the coverage is recalculated by running the model with the updated dataset. Similarly, a gradient for the updated dataset is computed. These processes are repeated until the target coverage rate is achieved. Data manipulation algorithm is implemented by the user in Python.
author: AIST

inventories.name: tf_ckpt
inventories.description:
Tensorflow model datas.

                                             This is loaded by `tf.train.import_meta_graph`.

parameters.name: mnist_image_px_size
parameters.description: MNIST Imagge pixel size.

parameters.name: determination_on_activation
parameters.description:
Neuron Activity/Inactivity

                                            Determination Type

                                            0: Threshold Determination

                                            1: Upper/Lower Limit Determination

                                            2: N Cases of Maximum Value Determination

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description:
Threshold

                                            Valid only for threshold determination

parameters.name: lower_bound
parameters.description:
Lower Limit

                                            No default value

                                            (Valid only for upper/lower limit determination)

parameters.name: upper_bound
parameters.description:
Upper Limit

                                            No default value

                                            (Valid only for upper/lower limit determination

parameters.name: activation_filter_no
parameters.description:
Number of Cases N

                                            The default value is 1

                                            (Valid only for N Cases of maximum value determination)

parameters.name: heat_map_type
parameters.description:
Heat Map Generation Method Type

                                            The default value is 1

                                            0: Generation Not Necessary

                                            1: 0/1 Table

                                            2: Simple Increment

                                            3: Density Coverage

parameters.name: combination_type
parameters.description:
Combination Type

                                            The default value is 0

                                            0: Implementation Not Necessary

                                            1: Execute

parameters.name: combination_first
parameters.description:
One Layer of Combination Coverage Target

                                            No default value

                                            (Valid and mandatory only for combination type execution)

parameters.name: combination_second
parameters.description:
The Other Layer of Combination Coverage Target

                                            No default value

                                            (Valid and mandatory only for combination type execution)

parameters.name: target_scope_name
parameters.description:
Names of tensorflow scopes in which neural networks are defined

                                            No default value (Mandatory)

                                            List items are separate by ",".

parameters.name: edit_num
parameters.description:
Number of data manipulated at a time

                                            The default value is 100

parameters.name: target_rate
parameters.description:
Target Coverage Rate (Execution terminates when the coverage reaches Target Coverage Rate)

                                            The default value is 1.0

parameters.name: increase_rate
parameters.description:
Expected Coverage Growth Rate (if the coverage growth rage compared to 5 times before is less than Expected Coverage Growth Rate, unused manipulations are preferentially selected)

                                            The default value is 0.0

parameters.name: dataset_x_num
parameters.description:
Number of Input Data Placeholders (in the given dataset)

                                            No default value (Mandatory)

parameters.name: dataset_y_num
parameters.description:
Number of Label Data Placeholders (in the given dataset)

                                            No default value (Mandatory)

parameters.name: dataset_k_num
parameters.description:
Number of Constant Data Placeholders (in the given dataset)

                                            No default value (Mandatory)

parameters.name: split_dataset_start
parameters.description:
Dataset Division Start Position (Data from Start Position to End Position of the given dataset are used for coverage testing)

                                            The default value is 0

parameters.name: split_dataset_end
parameters.description:
Dataset Division End Position (Data from Start Position to End Position of the given dataset are used for coverage testing)

                                            The default value is the size of the given dataset

parameters.name: implement_class_name
parameters.description:
Class Name in which function 'get_atomic_manipulations' is implemented

                                            No default value (Mandatory)

measures.name: coverage_rate_all_layer
measures.description: coverage of the model as a whole.

measures.name: coverage_rate_each_layer
measures.description: coverage of each layer in the model.

downloads.name: heatmap
downloads.description: the heat map of the coverage as an HTML file.

downloads.name: abs_dataset
downloads.description: the created input data by the manipulation as h5 file.
